if.description: Structure that executes commands only if the defined condition is true.

ifelse.description: Structure that evaluates the condition and executes the 'if' commands if it is true and the 'else' if it is false.

ifelseif.description: Structure that makes possible to verify another 'if' condition, if the first one is false.

while.description: Loop that executes the commands until the condition be false.

do.description: Loop that executes the commands before checking the condition, until be false.

for.description: Loop that executes commands for a predetermined number of times.
